name: DAMSEL (itch)
description:
A few members from Masondogg Studios teamed up in their off-time to fool around in a quick personal gamejam. Their Mission? To finish a game back-to-front in 24 hours.

Dinosaur Assault Machine (with) Security (and) Emergency Logic, or DAMSEL, is here to save planet X from the Dinotopians, a race of bipedal dinosaurs hellbent on destroying the vulnerable population of planet X! 

In this incredible action game, take control of DAMSEL, her motorcycle, and one large dino-destruction cannon as you single-handedly protect planet X from prehistoric predators!

Are you fast enough? Are you tough enough? Download now!
